SEARCH
Package cop4331.models

Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
cop4331.models.ShoppingCart
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShoppingCart extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a shopping cart for items to be purchased. Implements Serializable to enable serialization of ShoppingCart objects.
Author:
S Hassan Shaikh, Austin Vasquez, Divyesh Mangapuram, Jorge Martinez
See Also:

    • GetItem

      public Item GetItem(int index)
      Retrieves the item at a specific index in the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item to retrieve.
      Returns:

    • GetPurchaseAmount

      public int GetPurchaseAmount(int index)
      Retrieves the purchase amount of an item at a specified index in the cart.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item in the cart.
      Returns:
      The purchase amount of the item at the specified index.

    • ContainsItem

      public int ContainsItem(Item item)
      Checks if the cart contains a specific item and returns its index.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to check for in the cart.
      Returns:
      The index of the item in the cart; returns -1 if the item is not present.

    • SetPurchaseAmount

      public void SetPurchaseAmount(int index, int amount)
      Sets the purchase amount for an item at a specified index in the cart.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item in the cart.
      amount - The new purchase amount to be set. If the amount is 0 or less, the item is removed from the cart.

    • RemoveItem

      public void RemoveItem(int index)
      Removes an item from the cart at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item to be removed from the cart.

    • ClearCart

      public void ClearCart()
      Clears the entire cart by removing all items and purchase amounts.

    • AddItem

      public void AddItem(Item newItem)
      Adds an item to the cart with a default purchase amount of 1.
      Parameters:
      newItem - The item to be added to the cart.

    • AddItem

      public void AddItem(Item newItem, int amount)
      Adds an item to the shopping cart with a specified purchase amount.
      Parameters:
      newItem - The item to add to the shopping cart.
      amount - The purchase amount for the item.

    • GetSize

      public int GetSize()
      Gets the number of items in a shopping cart.
      Returns:
      The size of the shopping cart.

    • GetTotal

      public float GetTotal()
      Retrieves the total price of items in the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      The total price of items in the shopping cart.
